# CMeel glslang

[![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/cmeel-glslang.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/cmeel-glslang)
[![Release](https://github.com/cmake-wheel/cmeel-glslang/actions/workflows/release.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/cmake-wheel/cmeel-glslang/actions/workflows/release.yml)

[glslang](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glslang) distribution for cmeel packages.
